short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to manage your UX LivingLab account. It comes with options like notification, login/logout, chat, logs, and setting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a gateway to use products of Dowell. It is designed for both inhouse and external use. You can manage your UX Living Lab Account, automate tasks, and increase overall productivity with an improved user experience. The extension includes options like real-time notification, easy login/logout, customer support chat, logs, and profile setting. There are no security risks in this version.
